main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects reported in Fayetteville, Georgia, and other locations during October 1952.
interesting points: Observers reported seeing a disc-shaped object moving quickly in Fayetteville, Georgia, on October 28, 1952., A civilian reported a similar disc-shaped object hovering before it suddenly accelerated., Witnesses in Atlanta described a strong orange-colored object that changed colors and moved rapidly., Reports of angel hair phenomena in France were attributed to spider migration rather than extraterrestrial activity., The sightings were part of the Project Blue Book investigations into unidentified aerial phenomena.
sighted object: disc-shaped object, cylindrical object, orange light
